statements: SELECT * FROM music_teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, student_name FROM music_teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM music_teachers WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_name FROM music_teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, lesson_date FROM music_teachers WHERE lesson_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name, lesson_date, lesson_time, student_name FROM music_teachers WHERE lesson_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM music_teachers WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe' AND student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(student_name) AS total_students FROM music_teachers GROUP BY teacher_name
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name, lesson_date FROM music_teachers ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, teacher_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_name FROM music_teachers WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM MusicTeachers
SELECT Name, Email FROM MusicTeachers WHERE ID = 1
SELECT LessonDate, LessonTime FROM Lessons ORDER BY LessonDate DESC
SELECT TeacherID, StudentID, LessonDuration FROM Lessons WHERE LessonDuration > 60
SELECT Name, Phone FROM MusicTeachers WHERE Email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM MusicTeachers WHERE Name = 'John Doe';
SELECT LessonID, LessonDate, LessonTime FROM Lessons WHERE TeacherID = 1 AND LessonDuration > 60;
SELECT Name, Email FROM MusicTeachers WHERE Phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT LessonID, LessonTime FROM Lessons WHERE LessonDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY LessonTime DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalLessons, TeacherID FROM Lessons GROUP BY TeacherID HAVING TotalLessons > 5;
SELECT * FROM LessonSchedule ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_duration ASC
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM MusicTeachers WHERE teacher_id = 1
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM MusicTeachers
SELECT * FROM LessonSchedule WHERE lesson_duration > 60
SELECT * FROM TeachingCalendar ORDER BY available_slots DESC, teaching_date ASC
SELECT * FROM MusicTeachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM MusicTeachers WHERE teaching_subject = 'Piano';
SELECT * FROM LessonSchedule WHERE lesson_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(lesson_id) AS total_lessons FROM MusicTeachers JOIN LessonSchedule ON MusicTeachers.teacher_id = LessonSchedule.teacher_id GROUP BY teacher_name;

SELECT teacher_name, teaching_date, available_slots FROM TeachingCalendar JOIN MusicTeachers ON TeachingCalendar.teacher_id = MusicTeachers.teacher_id WHERE teacher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY teaching_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Lesson_Schedule;
SELECT teacher_id, lesson_date FROM Lesson_Schedule ORDER BY teacher_id ASC, lesson_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM Teachers WHERE teaching_subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade >= 10 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT calendar_id, lesson_date FROM Calendar WHERE lesson_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Lesson_Schedule ORDER BY lesson_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM Teachers WHERE teaching_subject='Math'
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10
SELECT teacher_name, lesson_date FROM Teachers JOIN Calendar ON Teachers.teacher_id = Calendar.teacher_id
SELECT teacher_name, lesson_date FROM Teachers JOIN Calendar ON Teachers.teacher_id = Calendar.teacher_id WHERE lesson_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Music_Teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_experience FROM Music_Teachers WHERE teaching_specialization = 'Piano';
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 10 ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time, lesson_duration FROM Lesson_Schedule WHERE lesson_location = 'Studio A' ORDER BY lesson_date ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, calendar_month, total_lessons, lessons_completed FROM Teaching_Calendar WHERE teacher_id = 'abc123' AND calendar_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM Music_Teachers WHERE teaching_specialization = 'Piano' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_contact FROM Students WHERE student_age > 10 AND student_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_experience FROM Music_Teachers WHERE teaching_location = 'New York' AND teaching_experience > 5 ORDER BY teaching_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM Lesson_Schedule WHERE lesson_date = '2022-12-15' AND lesson_location = 'Studio A' ORDER BY lesson_time ASC;
SELECT student_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payment_Records PR JOIN Students S ON PR.student_id = S.student_id WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
